metadata.title: MeQA: A pipeline for MeDIP-seq data quality assessment and analysis
metadata.abstract: Motivation: We present a pipeline for the pre-processing, quality assessment, read distribution and methylation estimation for methylated DNA immunoprecipitation (MeDIP)-sequence datasets. This is the first MeDIP-seq-specific analytic pipeline that starts at the output of the sequencers. This pipeline will reduce the data analysis load on staff and allows the easy and straightforward analysis of sequencing data for DNA methylation. The pipeline integrates customized scripting and several existing tools, which can deal with both paired and single end data. © The Author 2011. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.

description: MeQA is a pipeline for the pre-processing, quality assessment, read distribution and methylation estimation for MeDIP-sequence datasets.
name: MeQA
